about_the_game:
For the owners of "Air defenders - GOLD" additional opportunities are opened. You will be able to change the game map. Also all the coins you collect in the game will be doubled. Thanks to this, you will be able to accumulate coins faster to buy special equipment. Accordingly, you will be able to achieve great success in the game faster.

Forward to defend the airspace!
detailed_description:
For the owners of "Air defenders - GOLD" additional opportunities are opened. You will be able to change the game map. Also all the coins you collect in the game will be doubled. Thanks to this, you will be able to accumulate coins faster to buy special equipment. Accordingly, you will be able to achieve great success in the game faster.

Forward to defend the airspace!
name: Air defenders - GOLD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or better
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

short_description: An addition to the game "Air defenders", which will give you additional opportunities!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian
